Text:
Since The Pirate Bay choked on the Unicode character U+0304 COMBINING MACRON (the year is 2010, right?) and won't let me edit the description ("Error" is all the page says), allow me to clarify:

"Asoka" motion picture soundtrack (2001).

Format: FLAC (lossless)

Release date: 2001
Record label: Sony Music
Catalog number: 504792 2

Provenance: CD release -> WAV (with cdparanoia) -> FLAC.

Included:
  cdda2wav-generated CD metadata
  ripping/encoding logs
Can some one please seed this! There is one seeder, but cannot connect.
